name: FanFiction.net - Rehaul unangering to the eyes
description:
Full change for the author page and the fanfiction page.
Increased font(s), changed font(s), link coloring and such.
Enjoy.
additional_info:
Let's see:

Summary in story: you need Belwe CN font (google belwe cn bt) or to edit the summary section. A touch of goth is never wrong. Especially where isn't harmfull.

Link color: visited green and hover red. Usefull in night mode

Margin: 12.5% for side (aka 75% of the screen). Cuz reading side to side on a screen is tiring.

Story font: Comic Sans MS, 40 px. Again, tiring is tiring. And a tired eye is an eye in danger. ("line-height: 80px !important;" this put a double interline in the story. erase it if you want a more compact story)

Menù in Avangarde, a little bigger: it's here. I don't use it. Much. You don't use it. Much. At least is easy on the eye now. (if you dont have it google AvantGarde Md BT)

Author page, Stories summary: in Avangarde. Cuz it's easy on the eyes.

Author page, Bio: Avangarde, 16px. Almost no one read it. And some are bigger than a romance. At least now is in a clear and small font.
